mapper.select: select id, application_name, identifier, createtime, updatetime from application_rpc_account where id = #{id}
select id, application_name, identifier, createtime, updatetime from application_rpc_account limit #{offset}, #{limit}
mapper.insert: insert into application_rpc_account(application_name, identifier, createtime, updatetime) values (#{applicationName}, #{identifier}, #{createtime}, #{updatetime})

insert into application_rpc_account(application_name, identifier, createtime, updatetime) values
(#{entity.applicationName}, #{entity.identifier}, #{entity.createtime}, #{entity.updatetime})

insert into application_rpc_account(application_name, identifier, createtime, updatetime) values
(#{entity.applicationName}, #{entity.identifier}, #{entity.createtime}, #{entity.updatetime})
on duplicate key update application_name = values(application_name) , identifier = values(identifier) , createtime = values(createtime) , updatetime = values(updatetime)
mapper.update:
update application_rpc_account
application_name = #{applicationName},
identifier = #{identifier},
createtime = #{createtime},
updatetime = #{updatetime},
where id = #{id}
